pack.name: Stormlight RPG Core (Data Pack)
pack.notes: Surge definitions; these extend the base schema with new record types.

records.name: Adhesion
records.rules_text: Adhesion manipulates pressure and atmospheric bonds. Windrunners use it for binding and spiritual pressure effects.

records.name: Gravitation
records.rules_text: Gravitation manipulates gravitational attraction and allows Windrunners to alter their direction of fall or flight.
